# humanitec Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "humanitec" {
  org_id = "organization"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_url` (String) Humanitec API URL prefix
- `auth_token` (String, Sensitive) Humanitec Auth Token
- `org_id` (String) Humanitec Organization ID
